replies.body:
my controls are different from default, basically because i learned soup pvp and didnt want to go all the way over to 7, 8, 9

R: Sword
2: Bow
3: Usually Lava, when I dont have any, blocks
4: Gapple
5: Blocks
6: Food
 G: Water
T: Blocks
C: Rod

F:Sneak
1: 2nd/3rd perspective

R is toggle sprint
the rest are pretty much the same

replies.body:
1 Sword
2 Bow
3 Pickaxe
4 Axe
5 Golden Apples
6 Food
7 Glass blocks
8 Stone blocks
9 Wood blocks

If there are no Glass/Stone blocks, I usually just use the wood blocks on these slots or nothing. When I use a water bucket, I put it on slot 9

replies.body:
Yall have some funky settings lol, my settings are normal to me but they were from me having to share a pc with my brother and we had to compromise on settings and keys that worked for us so PrankedLOL and I use this:
Right hand mouse (lowest dpi which is like 450 with 80-130 sensitivity, 70FOV & low low low video settings)
1. Sword because im normal
2. Bow (fishing rod if available, I also use the slot if im pulling something out of my inventory quickly)
3. Gaps (if i have any on avicus, but usually if will be bow if i have a fishing rod on any other server)
4. Blocks, steak, or water bucket
5. misc.
6. gaps if 3rd slot is taken
7. a mess
8. a mess, but if i have a water bucket in the 9 slot it'll be blocks
9. blocks or water bucket (mlg pro)

replies.body:
and im not done there xd
Zoom - f
Sprint - q because it is easier for me to go from 1, 2 and sprint 
Drop - r
f5 mode - c because it is easy for me
I can only reach up to 6 without any issue/having to put extra effort so i scroll for 7, 8, and 9.

replies.body:
hypersensitivity, quake pro, 8200 dpi (as high as my mouse will go), i use F for changing perspective, X for zoom, i use 1-5 and scroll the rest

i use a razer taipan
and yes i use quake pro all the time, even with speed/speed2
